creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: four nude children in a landscape
inscription:
Signature, Date, Stamp

-- in graphite on verso, upper center: B. Vol. XIV / P. 240, No. 320 / L\'Amour et les 3 enfants
-- possible mark on verso, lower left: GQ[?]
markings: black stamp on recto, lower right: Peter Lely (Lugt 2092)
provenance: Sir Peter Lely; Earl of Pembroke (print not stamped, but ref. Lugt 2636b); [his sale, Sotheby's, July 5-10, 1917, no. 194]; John E. Andrus III, Wayzata, Minn.; by descent to his daughters, Elizabeth, Katie, and Julie. Earlier provenances have been gathered, but further research will increase our knowledge of their histories.
signed: monogram in plate, lower left: [MA surmounted by F]; date in plate, on container: [1506 18S] (Bartsch says \"18S\" indicates September 18)
title: Cupid and Three Putti
